story.text: We will extend client-side markup and rendering with javascript modules that can be installed by a site owner without additional rights, shared from owner to owner, and selected by the viewer when launching a tab. [https://github.com/WardCunningham/assets/tree/master/pages/client-type-modules github]

We will test render these plugins now. You need to be viewing with [[Smallest Deployed]] and include a type library in the query portion of the url. [http://ward.asia.wiki.org:4444?type=client-type-modules#view/client-type-modules example]
